caption: Relating to a lottery game played or facilitated for play by telephone or through an Internet or mobile Internet application; creating criminal offenses.
authors: Hall, Alvarado, Bettencourt, Birdwell, Campbell, Cook, Creighton, Flores, Hagenbuch, Hancock, Hinojosa, Adam, Huffman, King, Kolkhorst, Middleton, Paxton, Perry, Sparks, West
